title: Deploy Data Sync Pro Configurations
overview: This recipe demonstrates how to deploy Data Sync Pro configurations between environments using a template downloaded from DSP.
whenToUse: DSP enables the creation of reusable deployment templates for solutions built on record-based configurations, such as Data Sync Pro, nCino, CPQ, and Salesforce Revenue Cloud. These templates can be imported into any environment for ongoing customization and reuse in record-based configuration deployments.

prerequisites.description: Download the DSP deployment template from the portal.
Ensure a deployment Pipeline exists with Template Direction configured.
